thread.title: Bernie Sanders, Vermont senator, shows strength with big crowds as first Democratic debate looms
thread.title_full: Bernie Sanders, Vermont senator, shows strength with big crowds as first Democratic debate looms - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Bernie Sanders, Vermont senator, shows strength with big crowds as first Democratic debate looms
text: BOULDER, Colo. | Days before the first Democratic presidential candidates debate, Sen. Bernard Sanders sent a signal to his competition by drawing hefty crowds at weekend rallies. An estimated 9,000 supporters converged Saturday at Potts Field at the University of Colorado Boulder for the Vermont senator's campaign appearance, a day ... ...
